abstract: The Japanese car company, which makes the Prius hybrid car, expects to increase its product line in the next few years.
snippet: The Japanese car company, which makes the Prius hybrid car, expects to increase its product line in the next few years.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota plans to introduce two electric vehicles in the United States and six hybrid cars worldwide by the end of 2012, a company executive said Monday.

headline.print_headline: Toyota Plans 2 Electric Autos in the U.S. and 6 Hybrids by 2012
